N

net.sf.jgcs - package net.sf.jgcs
Defines a generic interface for group communication.
net.sf.jgcs.annotation - package net.sf.jgcs.annotation
Defines optional annotations for messages.
net.sf.jgcs.spi - package net.sf.jgcs.spi
Supports service providers with a set of abstract classes that ease the implementation of bindings to concrete group communication protocols.
